dialogues.text: Hello my name is Dr. Penguin! This is a test of the event driven dialogue system. Create an unmixed crude buffer solution to progress this dialogue.
This is a conversation between you and me Dr Penguin. I'm Lab assitatnt hedgeohg
Hello, lets get to mixing. Click on the beaker and move it around to mix it
Mix it until stars come out
Hello, lets centrifuge. Drag the tubes into the centrifuge such that it is balanced, then press start. The weights of each tube are written on its cap
Oh dear Dr Penguin, it seems this game has a lot of bugs
Shhhh. The programmer is trying his best.
This is a test of using a measuring cylinder. click anywhere on the screen to pour. careful, only pour when youre ready. letting go will stop you from pouring
